quotes.quote: Before you judge a man, walk a mile in his shoes. After that who cares?... He’s a mile away and you’ve got his shoes!
quotes.author: Billy Connolly

quotes.quote: If I were two-faced, would I be wearing this one?
quotes.author: Abraham Lincoln

quotes.quote: The only mystery in life is why the kamikaze pilots wore helmets.
quotes.author: Al McGuire

quotes.quote: I’m too drunk to taste this chicken.
quotes.author: Colonel Sanders

quotes.quote: When I die, I want to die like my grandfather who died peacefully in his sleep. Not screaming like all the passengers in his car.
quotes.author: Will Rogers

quotes.quote: I intend to live forever. So far, so good.
quotes.author: Steven Wrigh

quotes.quote: When I was a kid my parents moved a lot, but I always found them.
quotes.author: Rodney Dangerfield

quotes.quote: I remixed a remix, it was back to normal.
quotes.author: Mitch Hedberg

quotes.quote: The best way to teach your kids about taxes is by eating 30 percent of their ice cream.
quotes.author: Bill Murray

quotes.quote: I have always wanted to be somebody, but I see now I should have been more specific.
quotes.author: Lily Tomlin

quotes.quote: I did not attend his funeral, but I sent a nice letter saying I approved of it.
quotes.author: Mark Twain

quotes.quote: Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: What’s another word for Thesaurus?
quotes.author: Steven Wright

quotes.quote: Everything happens for a reason. But sometimes the reason is that you’re stupid and you make bad decisions.
quotes.author: Unknown

quotes.quote: It's not true that I had nothing on. I had the radio on.
quotes.author: Marilyn Monroe

quotes.quote: Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy.
quotes.author: Einstein

quotes.quote: My mother always used to say: The older you get, the better you get, unless you’re a banana.
quotes.author: Rose, The Golden Girls

quotes.quote: Before you marry a person, you should first make them use a computer with slow Internet to see who they really are.
quotes.author: Will Ferrell

quotes.quote: I’m not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
quotes.author: Michael Scott, The Office

quotes.quote: A good rule to remember for life is that when it comes to plastic surgery and sushi, never be attracted by a bargain.
quotes.author: Graham Norton

quotes.quote: As you get older, three things happen. The first is your memory goes, and I can’t remember the other two.
quotes.author: Sir Norman Wisdom

quotes.quote: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
quotes.author: Steve Martin
